tool.name: Fragmentation Classes from Density and Connectivity
tool.description: Fragmentation classes:<br/>(1) interior, if Density = 1.0<br/>(2) undetermined, if Density > 0.6 and Density = Connectivity<br/>(3) perforated, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity > 0<br/>(4) edge, if Density > 0.6 and Density - Connectivity < 0<br/>(5) transitional, if 0.4 < Density < 0.6<br/>(6) patch, if Density < 0.4<br/>

param.name: DENSITY_INT
param.label: Minimum Density for Interior Forest [Percent]
param.help: if less than 100, it is distinguished between interior and core forest
